effect.name: Cross-stitch With Drop Shadow
effect.author: asker
effect.description:
Pixelate with a cross-stitch pattern and a simple shadow
Last Updated: 2026-01-11 00:54

parameter.name: Stitch Width
parameter.description: Width of one cross-stitch in pixels

parameter.name: Stitch Height
parameter.description: Height of one cross-stitch in pixels

parameter.name: Pattern Image
parameter.description: Pattern to use for the cross-stitches

parameter.name: Pattern Width
parameter.description: Number of cross-stitches along X-axis in pattern

parameter.name: Pattern Height
parameter.description: Number of cross-stitches along Y-axis in pattern

parameter.name: Shadow Opacity
parameter.description: Shadow opacity (0.0 being fully invisible and 1.0 being default visibility)
